GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of the required article by article id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the current article's vote property by article id

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
article.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all the comments for the given article id

comments.author: icellusedkars

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: creates an object of a new comment for the given article id

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the given comment by comment id

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
